DOC.brief_summary: The study examines and illustrates the utility of utilizing actigraphic measurements to assess treatment response.
DOC.brief_title: Actigraphic Measurement of a Neurosurgical Procedure
DOC.detailed_description: Actigraphic measurements, repeated verbal fluency and multi-symptom operationally defined observations will be recorded for an 11 to 12 day baseline period and continued following neurosurgical tumor resection until a repeat MRI is completed three months after the procedure.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of incidental meningioma Single subject preparing to receive neurosurgical intervention Inability to wear actigraphy device
